p: The biochemical markers (AST, ALP, ALT and Bilirubin) were verified with kits (AMS diagnostic, Italy). Red Blood Cells (RBCs), White Blood Cells (WBCs) and Platelets were calculated with the procedures by ( Dacie, 2006). Liver derived antioxidant enzymes i.e. SOD, GPx, CAT & total protein were assessed by the procedures of ( Winterbourn and Metodiewa, 1999, Misra and Fridovich, 1972, Flohe and GÃ¼nzler, 1984, Lowry et al., 1951).
